__data__.text: This is Crowd Agent at 2025年02月13日（星期四）09:30 Plan：Wake up at 6；Move to CHIJMES plazas at 7:00；Wait orderly according to guidance at 8:00；Observe crowd density and adjust position at 9:00；Continue moving and waiting as per event flow at 10:00；Take a short break in a suitable spot at 11:30；Follow on-site guidance for movement at 12:00；Adjust position based on congestion at 13:00；Continue orderly movement within the plaza at 14:00；Observe and adjust position again at 15:00；Stay in a suitable spot for observation at 16:00；Follow any final movement instructions at 17:00；Move to a less crowded area at 18:00；Wait in a safe and comfortable position at 19:00；End the day's activity at 20:00
